text: There wasn't much romance on the menu for Sofia Richie and Scott Disick on Thursday night. The 20 - year - old aspiring model and her 35 - year - old boyfriend were spotted out for dinner at YU / MI Sushi in Beverly Hills. The pair were both glued to their cell phones and didn't seem to talk much at all once their food arrived. Dialing it in : Sofia Richie, 20, and Scott Disick, 35, were glued to their phones when they were spotted out for dinner at YU / MI Sushi in Beverly Hills on Thursday. No romance on the menu : The couple didn't even get off their phones when their meal arrived They're talking... but not to each other : They didn't switch off during their night out Earlier
